column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We visited this location on a recent trip to Chicago.  When we walked in we were seated immediately.  Within 15 minutes of our arrival the wait for a table was 1 hour.  I would say that the hostess is without much personality and really didn't care whether people had to wait an hour or more.  BUT our server
column4: WAS INCREDIBLE.  She greeted us with a smile that never left her face the entire time she was working.  She was hustling the entire time we were there.  We ordered a salad and their signature pizza.  The pizza was perfect.  We bought a bottle of the salad dressing which was a "sweet vinaigrette" and just wonderful.  I have to say that I would go back over and over again.
